# 1280 Trivia - Project Instructions

## Project Overview

A Jackbox-style trivia game that parses iMessage chat data to generate roast-style questions about friends from group chats at 1280 West Condos.

## Tech Stack

- Python backend (Flask)
- SQLite database
- WebSocket for real-time gameplay
- HTML/CSS/JS frontend
- Chat parsing for iMessage data

## Key Features

- Parse iMessage chat database
- Generate multiple question types (roast, "who said this", "who's most likely")
- Web-based host/player interface
- Real-time scoring and gameplay
- Modular question system

## Question Categories

- "Receipts" - who said what
- "Red Flags" - embarrassing moments
- "Degenerate of the Week" - worst behavior
- "Random Trivia" - normal questions mixed in

## Development Guidelines

- Keep code modular for easy question type additions
- Focus on humor while maintaining friendliness
- Ensure scalable architecture for multiplayer gameplay
- Include CSV export functionality for chat analysis
